concept.title: Execute test suites containing associated test cases

note.p: What is a suite test case?

li.p: A suite test case is a test case in a test suite.
To execute test suites in the CLI, Docker, or CI/CD tools, you need an active Katalon Runtime Engine license.

For real-time monitoring and better reporting capabilities, consider integrating your project with Katalon TestOps. Learn more about Katalon TestOps integration here: Upload Test Results to Katalon TestOps from Katalon Studio.

ol.li: Add the associated test case to a test suite.

li.p: To conduct data binding, in the test suite editor, click Show Data Binding.

image.alt: Data binding section in the test suite

li.p: Select the data binding level. You can bind data at the test case (TC) or suite test case (STC) level. The Use Variables and Binding at Suite Test Case option is selected by default.

row.entry: Use Variables and Binding at Test Case

With this option:
Katalon executes the associated test case with the data binding at the test case level.
To edit the data binding at the test case level, click the Test Case hyperlink. By doing so, the users are navigated to the Variables & Data Binding tab of the associated test case.
Choose the Use Variables and Binding at Test Case option
While selecting the Use Variables and Binding at Test Case option, you can not conduct data binding at the suite test case level.
Choose the Use Variables and Binding at Test Case option
Use Variables and Binding at Suite Test Case

With this option:
Katalon executes the associated test case with the data binding at the suite test case level.
You can edit the Test Data and Variable Binding tables at the STC level. To learn more about binding data at the STC level, you can refer to this document: Manage Data Binding.
Choose the Use Variables and Binding at Suite Test Case option

ul.li: In case your test suite has existing data configurations, switching to the Use Variables and Binding at Test Case option does not remove the preconfigured data in the suite test case.

li.p: Once finished, hit Run to execute your test suite.
